pkgmetadata.longdescription: Aligned Rank Transform // The Aligned Rank Transform for nonparametric factorial ANOVAs as described by J. O. Wobbrock, L. Findlater, D. Gergle, J. J. Higgins, "The Aligned Rank Transform for nonparametric factorial analyses using only ANOVA procedures", CHI 2011 DOI:10.1145/1978942.1978963.
